arts.ttl: Second only to one man: Flick reaches Barcelona milestone in incredible manner
arts.sum: While much of the scoring burden falls on Robert Lewandowski and Raphinha, Barcelona’s attack has found goals from a variety of players. Flick’s achievement places him in the club’s history books as the second-fastest coach to reach 100 goals, behind only Helenio Herrera, who managed it in 31 matches back in 1959 – only one fewer than Flick.

arts.ttl: Barcelona scores four goals in opening 24 minutes and overwhelms Valencia 7-1 in Spanish league
arts.sum: Barcelona overwhelmed Valencia in the Spanish league on Sunday with four different players scoring in the first 24 minutes of a 7-1 victory . The victory moved Barcelona within three points of second-placed Atletico Madrid and seven points off leader Real Madrid, which won 3-0 at Valladolid on Saturday with a hat trick by Kylian Mbappé .
